name: Introduction to Biology
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamental concepts in biology

name: Cell Biology
description: This course provides an in-depth study of cell structure, function, and life cycles

name: Genetics
description: This course covers the basic concepts of genetics, including Mendelian inheritance, mutations, and DNA structure and function

name: Anatomy and Physiology I
description: This course covers the structure and functions of the human body, including the skeletal, muscular, nervous, and endocrine systems

name: Anatomy and Physiology II
description: This course covers the structure and functions of the human body, including the cardiovascular, respiratory, reproductive, digestive, and urinary systems
